fields.ctaButtonCopy: My Boll & Branch Order|A Gift - refunded with a Gift Card|Mattress Foundation, Mattress Topper & Rugs
fields.menuTermsCopy: All Gift Returns will be refunded with a Boll & Branch Gift Card. Read our full return policy

helpText.ctaButtonCopy: Separate each button in order using |
helpText.menuTermsCopy: The terms to show under the buttons on the main Returns page.
helpText.menuTermsCopyCtaLink: The url for the link in the terms copy to go to i.e /pages/faqs
helpText.menuTermsCopyCtaCopy: The 'text' for the link that is in the terms copy
helpText.returnDays: Select the number of days to allow for the returns window.
helpText.excludedProductIds: Product IDs to exclude from returns (defaults to exclude gift cards). Separate products using |
